WEB_HOST.description: Hostname on which the web app runs

REDIRECT_ON_LOGIN_URL.description: The URL to redirect to on successful login

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A secret key for encrypting and signing data

SLACK_TOKEN_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: A key used to encrypt and decrypt Slack tokens

SLACK_CLIENT_ID.description: A key for a Slack app

SLACK_CLIENT_SECRET.description: A secret for a Slack app
